description: This app uses the following API services and open source libraries. We thank the providers of each service and library.
footer: Tap a library to open its GitHub repository

deepl.name: DeepL API
deepl.license: Commercial use allowed (subject to API terms)
deepl.description: High-precision neural machine translation API. Used for English to Japanese translation.

yahoo.name: Yahoo! JAPAN Text Analysis API
yahoo.license: Non-commercial (subject to Yahoo! JAPAN Web Services terms)
yahoo.description: Provides Japanese morphological analysis and furigana. Used for Japanese text analysis.

dictionary.name: Free Dictionary API
dictionary.description: Free English dictionary API. Used to get word definitions, pronunciations, and examples.

jmdict.name: JMdict (Japanese-Multilingual Dictionary)
jmdict.description: Japanese-English dictionary data managed by Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group (EDRDG). Used for English-Japanese and Japanese-English translation.

bluesky.name: Bluesky AT Protocol API
bluesky.description: Decentralized social network protocol. Used for feed retrieval and posting.
